attributes.action: change the way the ippc take complaints,make it indipendent !!! like the { i }stands for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the police complaint systm needs to change as every complaint the public make gets sent to the chief inspector of the officer or officers that we complain about .what happens when its the chife inspector and his officers that any one needs to complain about ?.the ippc can not send the complaint to the chife of the station as it will never be looked in to ?i personly have made lots of complaint that consern chife inspectors ect but thay never get past as thay are incharge of passing them , make the ippc indipendent as the { i }stands for
